attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Jackie Smith announced on the 16/10/08 plans for a nationwide überdatabase which will hold 1) Telephone call details 2) Internet communications details and 3) Email communications details.

There is no need to spy on the UK citizens in this way and other perposals should be tabled which will use public money more efficiently and that would be supported by the public as a whole.

Local councils and the Polica have abused RIPA legislation and there are no guartees that this legislation won't be restricted in the same way.

The goverment and it's agencys also have a terrorable record for loss of data.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
